text: John A. Roche (August 12, 1844 - February 10, 1904) was an American politician. He was the mayor of Chicago, Illinois (1887-1889). He was a Republican. Roche was born on August 12, 1844 in Utica, New York.The History of Chicagoâ€™s Mayors Roche died on February 10, 1904 in Chicago from a type of poisoning, aged 59. ==References== Category:1844 births Category:1904 deaths Category:Accidental deaths Category:Burials at Rosehill Cemetery Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Utica, New York
title: John A. Roche
